title: Celebration Animation Tester
description: A testbed showcasing 10 different celebration animations designed to reward student achievements in educational MicroSims. Animations include stars, sparkles, confetti, balloons, rockets, and more.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Animation
Educational Technology
Gamification
UI/UX
learningObjectives: Provide reusable animation code for other MicroSims
Showcase particle system techniques in p5.js
prerequisites: None for viewing; JavaScript knowledge for code reuse

controls.name: animationSelect
controls.description: Select which celebration animation to preview

animations.name: Yellow Stars
animations.description: Classic golden stars floating upward with rotation

animations.name: Rainbow Sparkle Burst
animations.description: Colorful sparkles exploding from center in rainbow colors

animations.name: Happy Star Sprinkle
animations.description: Smiling stars gently falling like sprinkles

animations.name: Alphabet Fireworks
animations.description: Letters shooting up and exploding like fireworks

animations.name: Super Reader Confetti
animations.description: Rectangular confetti in bright colors tumbling down

animations.name: Magic Book Bloom
animations.description: Glowing particles blooming outward like opening a magic book

animations.name: Giggle Glitter Pop
animations.description: Bouncy glitter circles that pop and multiply

animations.name: Storytime Spark Shower
animations.description: Gentle sparks falling like rain with trails

animations.name: Reading Rocket Zoom
animations.description: Rocket trails zooming across the screen

assumptions: Device supports Web Audio API for sound effects
limitations: Development/testing tool, not a learning activity itself
Performance may vary on older devices with many particles
